headline: Northrop Wins Contract to Aid Lebanon Air Force's C-208 Aircraft
summary: Northrop is set to offer follow-on sustainment support like program management, spare supplies and calibration support to the Lebanon Air Force.

headline: Kratos Defense Secures a Contract to Support the SSOV II Program
summary: KTOS and Corvid Technologies secure a contract to support the Short/Medium Range Sub-Orbital Vehicle II program.

headline: Palantir Technologies: Why I'm Buying Amid Global Isolation Fears (Rating Upgrade)
summary: Palantir's AI-driven security solutions thrive amidst rising defense budgets, leveraging a strategic moat for long-term revenue growth. See more on PLTR here.
